content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a wooden chest at position (43.5, -82.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a wooden chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position (40.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0)) 
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0)) 
Each furnace has a corresponding wooden chest

### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)) and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drill is out of fuel
- Ensure the burner mining drill has a sufficient fuel source before starting the mining operation
### Errors when chest at drop position is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining
### Errors when steam engine has no input liquid
- Ensure the steam engine has a sufficient fluid input to function properly
### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure the pipe group has a sufficient fluid input to function properly
### Errors when boiler is out of fuel
- Ensure the boiler has a sufficient fuel source before starting the operation
